text: István Konkoly (5 March 1930 – 20 November 2017) was a Hungarian prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. He served as Bishop of Szombathely from 1987 to 2006. He was born in Kerkaszentmiklós, Kingdom of Hungary. Konkoly died on 20 November 2017 in Szombathely, Hungary at the age of 87.Meghalt Konkoly István volt szombathelyi megyéspüspök ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1930 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Hungarian Roman Catholic bishops
title: István Konkoly
